reset_password_description: Enter the email address associated with your account. We'll send an email with instructions to reset your password.
sub_heading: Everything you need to know in one place.
heading: Terms of Service
informationcollection: Collection and use of data we receive.
rulesandinstructions: Rules and instructions for reporting inappropriate behavior.
description-text: ConnecterLife develops technologies and services to connect people, create communities, and expand their experiences on ConnecterLife. These Terms govern your use of Connecter Products, including the website, apps, services, technologies, and software we offer, unless expressly stated otherwise. Connecter provides these Products to you. We do not charge for your use of ConnecterLife or other products and services covered by these Terms, unless otherwise noted. Instead, companies, organizations, and others may collaborate with us to promote their travel and adventure-related offerings. By using our products, you agree that we may display promotional information that we consider potentially relevant to you and your travel experiences. We use your personal information to help determine which promotions will be shown to you. We do not sell your personal information to partners or share personally identifiable information with them unless we have your specific permission. Instead, our partners inform us about travelers' interests, and we display promotions to people who may be interested. We provide partners with reports on the performance of promotions to help them understand how people are interacting with their content. See Section 2 below for more information on how personalized promotions under these terms work in Connecter Products. Our Privacy Policy explains how we collect and use your personal data to determine some of the promotions that will be displayed and to provide all other services described below. You can also access the privacy settings of the Connecter Product in question at any time to view privacy options on how we use your data.
mission: ConnecterLife Mission: We make it easy for people to connect, create communities, and expand travel experiences. To fulfill this mission, we offer a variety of services, including:
tecnologies: Use and Development of Advanced Technologies
offerservices: To offer secure and functional services, we use advanced technologies such as artificial intelligence and augmented reality. Additionally, we constantly research to improve our services and ensure a consistent experience across the platform.
sharingcontent: By sharing content on ConnecterLife, you grant us a license to use, distribute, modify, and display that content. This license is essential to provide and improve our services. You retain ownership of intellectual property rights in your content.
userreport: We encourage users to report content that may violate their rights or our terms and policies. We reserve the right to remove or restrict access to content that violates our provisions.
personaldeletion: You can delete your content at any time, and account deletion will result in the deletion of associated personal content. However, some content may persist for up to 90 days due to technical processes.
revisedterms: These Terms of Service were last revised on January 6, 2024.
favoritecommunity: Thank you for choosing ConnecterLife as your favorite community. Explore, connect, and share your experiences!
welcome_message: Welcome to ConnecterLife, the social network dedicated to ConnecterLife, backpackers, and adventure enthusiasts. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, share, and protect your information when using our services. We recommend reading this document carefully.
transfer_info_question: What is the Privacy Policy and what does it cover?
transfer_info_answer: The Privacy Policy is a document that describes how we collect, use, share, and protect your personal information. It is crucial to ensure transparency and privacy protection for individuals using a service or platform.
info_collect_content: The information we collect and process about you depends on your use of ConnecterLife. This includes data provided when creating a profile, sharing travel stories, interacting with other users, and using our features.
privacy_control_content: It is important to us that you have control over your information. Therefore, we provide settings in your account to manage your privacy preferences.
use_info_answer: Explain in detail how ConnecterLife uses information, including the duration we retain information and the criteria for retention.
share_info_answer: Inform how information is shared on ConnecterLife, including cases of responding to legal requests, compliance with applicable laws, and promoting safety and protection.
how_long_info_question: 5. How Long We Keep Your Information
how_long_info_answer: We retain information for the time necessary to provide our Products, fulfill legal obligations, or protect our interests or those of others. We decide the duration on a case-by-case basis. We consider the following factors when making a decision:
legal_requests_content: Explain how information is transferred by ConnecterLife.
notification_changes_title: 7. How We Respond to Legal Requests
notification_changes_content: We access, preserve, and share your information in response to legal requests, complying with applicable laws and preventing harm.
contact_us_title: 8. How You Will Be Notified of Policy Changes
contact_us_content_1: We will send a notification before changing this Policy. You will have the opportunity to read the modified version before deciding to continue using our Products.
contact_us_content_2: If you have questions about this Policy or questions, complaints, or requests related to your information, please contact us as described below.
brazil_privacy_notice_title: 9. How to Contact in Case of Questions
brazil_privacy_notice_content: This section applies to the processing of personal data activities according to Brazilian laws and complements this Privacy Policy.
data_controller_info: The data controller responsible for your information is ConnecterLife, Inc. You also have the right to contact the National Data Protection Authority (“ANPD”) by contacting the ANPD directly.
invalid_email_error: Please enter a valid email address.
valid_email_domains_error: Please use one of the following domains: outlook.com, gmail.com, hotmail.com.

last_name_length_error: Last name must be at least 3 characters.
password_complexity_error: Password must be at least 8 characters and include a combination of numbers, symbols, uppercase, and lowercase letters.
phone_length_error: Phone number must be at least 3 characters.
invalid_credentials: Invalid credentials. Check your email and password.
required_fields_error: Email and password are mandatory fields.

title: ConnecterLife
question: Ever wondered how exciting it is to explore the world alongside other adventurers?
description: Connecter Life is here to help you discover traveler communities in different countries, as well as offer tips, recommendations, and local connections.
explore_title: Explore the world, share your experiences, and connect with other passionate travelers on Connecter Life.
step1: Discover traveler communities in different countries
step2: Find people who share your interests and passions for travel
step3: Connect and share experiences with other travelers
step4: Explore new places together, create itineraries, and experience unforgettable adventures
connect_with_travelers: Connect with travelers around the world
connect_text: Find company for your adventures and discover new destinations together!

introText: Welcome to ConnecterLife, the social network dedicated to travelers, backpackers, and adventure enthusiasts. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, share, and protect your information when you use our services. We recommend careful reading of this document.
question1: What is the Privacy Policy and what does it cover?
answer: The Privacy Policy is a document that describes how we collect, use, share, and protect your personal information. It is essential to ensure transparency and privacy protection for individuals using a service or platform.
sectionOneContent: The information we collect and process about you depends on your use of ConnecterLife. This includes data provided when creating a profile, sharing travel stories, interacting with other users, and using our features.
sectionTwoContent: It is important to us that you have control over your information. Therefore, we provide settings in your account to manage your privacy preferences.
sectionThreeContent: Explain details about the use of information by ConnecterLife, including the time we maintain the information and the criteria for retention.
sectionFourContent: Inform how information is shared in ConnecterLife, including cases of response to legal requests, compliance with applicable law, and promotion of security and protection.
sectionFive: 5. How Long We Keep Your Information
sectionFiveContent: We keep information for the time necessary to offer our Products, comply with legal obligations, or protect our interests or those of other people. We decide how long we need them on a case-by-case basis. We consider the following factors to make a decision:
sectionSixContent: Explain how information is transferred by ConnecterLife.
sectionSeven: 7. How We Respond to Legal Requests
sectionSevenContent: We access, preserve, and share your information in response to legal requests, complying with applicable law and preventing harm.
sectionEight: 8. How You Will Be Notified About Changes to the Policy
sectionEightContent: We will send you a notification before changing this Policy. You will have the opportunity to read the modified version before deciding to continue using our Products.
sectionNine: 9. How to Contact Us with Questions
sectionNineContent: If you have questions about this Policy or questions, complaints, or requests related to your information, please contact us as described below.
contactEmail: You can contact us via email:
brazilPrivacyNoticeContent: This section applies to personal data processing activities in accordance with Brazilian laws and complements this Privacy Policy.
dataController: The data controller responsible for your information is Travel Platforms, Inc. You also have the right to contact the National Data Protection Authority (“ANPD”) by contacting the DPA directly.
